question: Which paper investigates the influence of the diversity of source tasks on the performance of target tasks in prompt tuning using CrossFit?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper investigates the influence of the diversity of source tasks on the performance of target tasks in prompt tuning using CrossFit?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: Learning to Initialize: Can Meta Learning Improve Cross-task Generalization in Prompt Tuning?
